status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70v05","text":"Thaw Sf9 cell pellets at room temperature (typical size around 5g for 0.4 L of culture)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f844q","text":"All subsequent steps should be carried out at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bknop","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"36BE5B60057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i8l0","text":"Wash pellet twice with 15 mL of Phosphate-buffered Saline, centrifuge at   in between washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8eo8a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":420,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3BBC20C0057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l33c","text":"Collect cells after final wash by centrifugation at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aoqpq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1500","duration":420,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4E5B2050057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"496jc","text":"Swell cells in Lysis Buffer by incubating on ice for   to   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"esahs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"5DF06250057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"60F84B20057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4pls3","text":"Dilute homogenate in equal volume Resuspension Buffer and mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14nio","text":"Spin down at   to remove nuclear fraction and unbroken cells and save supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jq0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6CF91BC0057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dckrk","text":"Spin down at   (Sorvall SS-34 rotor) to remove mitochondrial-lysosomal fraction and save supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bsqrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":1200,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7685B810057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"701j7","text":"Transfer supernatant to ultracentrifuge tubes and spin down at   (Beckman Type 45 Ti rotor) to collect microsomes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"19tse","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200000","duration":2100,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"87939050057911ED8A30E59F4FAD5B42","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csvp","text":"Measure microsome concentrations based on total protein concentration using the Bradford Assay and bovine serum albumin as a standard","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"tnk5","text":"Flash-freeze in aliquots of 25-100 μL at concentrations between 2-5 mg/mL using liquid nitrogen and store at -80C until use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
